AmountDC.name: AmountDC
AmountDC.description: Amount in the default currency of the company. For almost all lines this can be calculated like: AmountDC = AmountFC * RateFC.

AmountFC.name: AmountFC
AmountFC.description: For normal lines it's the amount excluding VAT

Description.name: Description
Description.description: Description. Can be different for header and lines

EntryID.name: EntryID
EntryID.description: The unique ID of the entry. Via this ID all transaction lines of a single entry can be retrieved

ExtraDutyAmountFC.name: ExtraDutyAmountFC
ExtraDutyAmountFC.description: Extra duty amount in the currency of the transaction. Both extra duty amount and VAT amount need to be specified in order to differ this property from automatically calculated.

ExtraDutyPercentage.name: ExtraDutyPercentage
ExtraDutyPercentage.description: Extra duty percentage for the item

From.name: From
From.description: From date to identify the range for accrued/deferred revenue. This is used in combination with the property 'To' that defines the end date

GLAccount.name: GLAccount
GLAccount.description: The GL Account of the invoice line. This field is generated based on the revenue account of the item (or the related item group). G/L Account is also used to determine whether the costcenter / costunit is mandatory

IntraStatArea.name: IntraStatArea
IntraStatArea.description: IntraStat area (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatCountry.name: IntraStatCountry
IntraStatCountry.description: IntraStatCountry (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatDeliveryTerm.name: IntraStatDeliveryTerm
IntraStatDeliveryTerm.description: IntraStat delivery term (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatTransactionA.name: IntraStatTransactionA
IntraStatTransactionA.description: IntraStat transaction A (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

IntraStatTransactionB.name: IntraStatTransactionB
IntraStatTransactionB.description: IntraStat transaction B (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the Belgium, Luxembourg, France & United Kingdom administration)

IntraStatTransportMethod.name: IntraStatTransportMethod
IntraStatTransportMethod.description: IntraStat transport method (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

LineNumber.name: LineNumber
LineNumber.description: Indicates the sequence of the lines within one entry

Project.name: Project
Project.description: The project to which the sales transaction line is linked. The project can be different per line. Sometimes also the project in the header is filled although this is not really used

Quantity.name: Quantity
Quantity.description: The number of items sold in default units. The quantity shown in the entry screen is Quantity * UnitFactor

StatisticalNetWeight.name: StatisticalNetWeight
StatisticalNetWeight.description: Statistical NetWeight (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

StatisticalNumber.name: StatisticalNumber
StatisticalNumber.description: Statistical Number (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

StatisticalQuantity.name: StatisticalQuantity
StatisticalQuantity.description: Statistical Quantity (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

StatisticalValue.name: StatisticalValue
StatisticalValue.description: Statistical Value (only relevant when IntraStat for sales is enabled in the administration)

Subscription.name: Subscription
Subscription.description: When generating invoices from subscriptions, this field records the link between invoice lines and subscription lines

To.name: To
To.description: To date to identify the range for accrued/deferred revenue. This is used in combination with the property 'From' that defines the start date

Type.name: Type
Type.description: Type: 20 = Sales entry, 21 = Sales credit note

VATAmountDC.name: VATAmountDC
VATAmountDC.description: VAT amount in the default currency of the company

VATAmountFC.name: VATAmountFC
VATAmountFC.description: VAT amount in the currency of the transaction. Use this property to specify a VAT amount that differs from the VAT amount that is automatically calculated. However if the transaction uses extra duty, extra duty amount also needs to be specified.

VATBaseAmountDC.name: VATBaseAmountDC
VATBaseAmountDC.description: The VAT base amount in the default currency of the company. This is calculated based on the VATBaseAmountFC

VATBaseAmountFC.name: VATBaseAmountFC
VATBaseAmountFC.description: The VAT base amount in invoice currency. This is calculated with the use of VAT codes. It's an internal value

VATCode.name: VATCode
VATCode.description: The VAT code used when the invoice was registered. If this property is not filled, it will use the default VAT code of the G/L account property

VATPercentage.name: VATPercentage
VATPercentage.description: The VAT percentage of the VAT code. This is the percentage at the moment the invoice is created. It's also used by the default calculation of VAT amounts and VAT base amounts

endpoint_info.good_to_know: Use this endpoint to create, read, update or delete the entry lines of sales entries  created for your sales invoices. Note: Sales entries are separated to header and line information. Endpoint SalesEntryLines is used for the line information.  The relevance of properties is very much depending on the legislation and the package used.
